content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a specific case identified as case n° 42012021 without mentioning the names of the parties involved the case involves two parties one referred to as principle soccumbency who has been ordered to pay a certain amount of money initially they were ordered to pay €3777 but in the second degree the amount increased to €5615 the case lasted for seven years from september 20 2014 to june 25 2021 it revolves around the purchase of a property during a marriage under the legal community regime the nonpurchasing spouse claimed that the property was acquired using personal funds to exclude it from community property the case was appealed and an expert witness was appointed to determine the divisibility and value of the property the appellant argued that the lower courts judgment was erroneous and violated procedural and substantive rules the court ruled in favor of the appellant declaring the property as their exclusive ownership and rejecting the counterclaim for division made by the other party the court also ordered the other party to reimburse the appellant for the costs of the proceedings

metadata.cost: 3.777,00 EUR in first degree and 5615,00 EUR in second degree
